Texts.Chs: 有10%的几率击昏敌人。击晕时长取决于造成的伤害。
Texts.Eng: +10% Chance to Stun monsters on hit. Stun Length depends on damage dealt.

Texts.Chs: 使用狙击步枪、突击步枪和霰弹枪时，基础攻击提高至110%。
Texts.Eng: 110% Base Power with Sniper Rifles, Assault Rifles, and Shotguns.

Texts.Chs:
当能量达到最大值时，攻击力为110%。
当能量降到75%之下时Buff消失
Texts.Eng:
110% Power when Energy reaches full.
Cancelled when Energy drops below 75%.

Texts.Chs: 在使用单单手枪械和手榴弹时基本攻击力提高至120%。
Texts.Eng: 120% Base Power while using One-Handed Guns in combination with Grenades.

Texts.Chs: 升级版的二段跳，按[空格]冲刺。你可以在向任何方向冲刺，也可以在冲刺中改变方向。除非按住[SHIFT]键，否则默认方向为向上。冲刺时长取决于敏捷值。你可以在半空中冲刺两次。
Texts.Eng: An upgrade to Double Jump, press [Space] to dash. You can dash in all cardinal directions, as well as change direction mid-dash. Unless [Shift] is held, default direction is upwards. Dash Duration scales with Agility. You can dash twice in mid-air.

Texts.Chs: 可以装备破碎的守护团之剑
Texts.Eng: Can equip the Broken Protectorate Broadsword.

Texts.Chs:
无法装备近战或魔法武器。
无法双持武器。
无法使用厄尔吉斯之眼
Texts.Eng:
Cannot use Melee Weapons.
Cannot use Magic Weapons.
Cannot Dual-Wield.
Cannot use Erchius Eye.

Texts.Chs:
按[F]切换到缓慢移动的荆刺球。左键消耗能量发射导弹。按住鼠标右键消耗能量避免自己受到伤害。
由SushiSquid制作！
Texts.Eng:
Press [F] to switch to a slow-moving Spike Sphere. Left click to shoot a missile using some energy. Hold right click to drain your energy in order to shield yourself from damage.
Created by SushiSquid!

Texts.Chs: 按[G]（在按键设置中绑定[G]）让远程武器获得额外的武器伤害，并减少能量回复等待时间，但是速度和抵抗会降低。你可以再次按[G]来结束效果。如果提前结束效果的话，冷却时间就会缩短。
Texts.Eng: Press [G] (Bind [G] in your Controls) to gain extra weapon damage with ranged weapons and decreased energy regen block time: however, speed and resistance are decreased. You can end the effect by pressing [G] again. The cooldown shortens if so.

Texts.Chs:
按[F]恰一份MRE（军用个人野战口粮），增加一点点饱食度并回满能量。有90秒的冷却时间，当冷却激活时，你获得轻微的生命回复，但你的整体速度降低。
如果你的右手装备了一个榴弹发射器，按[F]向光标投掷一个效果较弱的军粮复制品，只需20能量: 有2秒的冷却时间。
Texts.Eng:
Press [Shift] + [F] to eat an MRE, gaining a bit of food and all your energy: this has a 90 second cooldown. While this cooldown is active, you gain slight health regen, but your overall speed is decreased.
If you have a Grenade equipped in your Right Hand, press [F] to toss a weaker, generated copy towards your cursor for only 20 Energy: this has a 2 second cooldown.
